header.title: SmiX.MODs Feed News Center
header.description: Creates RSS & ATOM feeds input to your board - posts content into forums, shows news as ticking news block ...
header.author-notes:
This mod is formerly known as lastRSS agregator & lastRSS autoposting bot .MODs. Both were merged, reworked and lastRSS parser class is not used anymore.
If you are using a previous version (lover than 0.4.0), remove .MOD from ACP at first and than delete existing files.
* Manual install : After copying the files in their place and editing all templates, run /install/index.php and press install.
* install with Automod : unzip SFNC-0.4.1.zip and copy SFNC-0.4.1 folder to /store/mods, then go to your Automod panel in ACP and press install. then you will see a green bar on top with a link to /install/index.php. Please click it to be forwarded to the database installer, then click Install again.
* Configuration : browse to ACP > .MODs > SmiX.MODs Feed News Center and set up everything as you want.
Required ACP permissions are Board administration ...
